name: Dodge-ball Wrestling
description:
one out of 2 games done during bad box art jam 2018.

game description:
For 2 player only!
Throw your heads at each other in a 2 player dodge-ball-platform-wrestling-game!

controls:
left player - WAD to move, S to throw
right player - arrows to move, down to throw

Important: When you're not holding a head, you gradually lose HP, and when you are holding one you gradually gain HP.

credits:
Game design and Coding - Ron Barak
Art - Galit "shoze" weisberg
Sound & music - Chen Ashkenazi
